    • IGameBoardFactory

      private IGameBoard IGameBoardFactory(int r, int c, int w)
      Factory method to create IGameBoards, here of dynamic type GameBoard
      Parameters:
      r - number of rows for the board to have
      c - number of columns for the board to have
      w - number in a row required to win
      Returns:
      [an IGameBoard of dynamic type GameBoard with r rows, c columns, and requiring w in a row to win]

    • MatrixFactory

      private char[][] MatrixFactory(int r, int c)
      Creates and returns a 2d char array with dimensions r by c filled with only spaces
      Parameters:
      r - number of rows in the matrix
      c - number of columns in the matrix
      Returns:
      [a 2d char array of dimensions r by c filled with only spaces]
